data.title: shander叠加
data.body:
Cocos2d-x 的 shader 不能叠加，这样要做复杂点的功能就要全部写成一个shader， 调试起来很麻烦热情容易出错啊，也不利于做成模块化
希望shader可以叠加，谢谢。

data.title: [ScriptingCore] Require cached js script lead to app crash after GC
data.body:
In cocos2dx-3.7 and cocos2dx-3.8:

Cached js scripts in ScriptingCore.cpp as filename_scripts are not Rooted, which means they are not GC-reachable.
After reclaimed by GC, anthoer JS_ExecuteScript call using the dangling pointer cause app crash.

data.title: [Web Engine] Draw labels directly on Screen instead of creating new canvas
data.body:
This is a modification for labelTTF under Canvas Mode
- Avoid drawing creating new _labelCanvas to temporarily store labels.
- In this mode, `use fillText()` instead of `drawImage()`
- use function `setDrawMode` to switch between draw on cached Canvas and Screen.

data.title: Can not link cocos2d-x in just released XCode 7.0
data.body:
Because I like to live dangerously (and please don't flame me for this stupidity), I usually just download all updates from Apple as they occur.

Yesterday, I saw the release version of XCode 7 and put it on my system, replacing previous release.  Now my XCode project fails to link when loading xcode.  So, I went and downloaded cocos2d-x v3.8 and tried to load this and failed again.  

Now I am getting failed to link messages in the lua test portion of cpp-tests command.

While I consider myself a pretty good programmer, I only know cocos as a casual user and not a developer.  I am also an apps developer from a whole bunch of different environments, but not any sort of expert for debugging linking issues on Mac's.

Would appreciate a straight forward set of directions to use cocos2d-x in the release version of XCode 7.0.  It would even be nice to just know that there is a vanilla install process to use cocos2d and the released XCode 7.

Thanks in advance for any help with this issue.  It is a real pain to have to debug system software, when my own code provides its own set of interesting bugs.

Stan

data.title: Textfiled support cursor v1.1
data.body:
Add StringUtils::StringUTF8 for easy manipulate utf8 string.
If TextField active(focused input text) show text cursor( default '|',
change TextFieldTTF::setCursorChar ).
Show/Hide interval CURSOR_TIME_SHOW_HIDE
Change position text cursor control key: KEY_HOME, KEY_END,
KEY_LEFT_ARROW, KEY_RIGHT_ARROW
CC_PLATFORM_MAC, CC_PLATFORM_WIN32, CC_PLATFORM_LINUX default use
cursor( For change state TextFieldTTF::setCursorUse )
Desktop implement dispatchControlKey
WinRT support key repeat and implement dispatchControlKey
Text cursor worked only on LabelType::TTF

new version it: #13600 , for easy merge

data.title: [ci skip] Set js templates Mac target platform from null to 10.7
'Configure' like script for cocos2d-x
data.body:
I need a way to remove some cocos2d-x libraries for specific games. For example, for 3D games I don't cocos3d_static and others, for games without physics I don't need Box2D etc.

Perhaps cocos console can have an option to disable some dependencies when creating a new project. This will dramatically reduce compilation time + library size.

Right now I do it manually for each project, but it's less than ideal.

data.title: ActionObject的脚本回调处理.
glsl在iphone6(a8 gpu) 下提示错误 OpenGL error 0x0502 但在其他 iphone和ipad设备上没有错误
SkyboxBrush : Make the shader parameter take effect at once
Xcode 7.0 ld warning - 3.8
data.body:
Updated to 3.8, compiled to get the following warning:

``` cpp
ld: warning: direct access in 
rapidjson::GenericValue<rapidjson::UTF8<char>, rapidjson::MemoryPoolAllocator<rapidjson::CrtAllocator> >& rapidjson::GenericValue<rapidjson::UTF8<char>, rapidjson::MemoryPoolAllocator<rapidjson::CrtAllocator> >::operator[]<rapidjson::MemoryPoolAllocator<rapidjson::CrtAllocator> >(rapidjson::GenericValue<rapidjson::UTF8<char>, rapidjson::MemoryPoolAllocator<rapidjson::CrtAllocator> > const&) to global weak symbol rapidjson::GenericValue<rapidjson::UTF8<char>, rapidjson::MemoryPoolAllocator<rapidjson::CrtAllocator> >& rapidjson::GenericValue<rapidjson::UTF8<char>, rapidjson::MemoryPoolAllocator<rapidjson::CrtAllocator> >::operator[]<rapidjson::MemoryPoolAllocator<rapidjson::CrtAllocator> >(rapidjson::GenericValue<rapidjson::UTF8<char>, rapidjson::MemoryPoolAllocator<rapidjson::CrtAllocator> > const&)::NullValue 
means the weak symbol cannot be overridden at runtime. This was likely caused by different translation units being compiled with different visibility settings.
```

What's mean? How to solve?

data.title: 脚本相关的一系列变更，由于有依赖关系，合到一个PR里PULL
v3.8 compatibility issue with json file exported by cocostudio v1.6
data.body:
In function SpriteFrameCacheHelper::retainSpriteFrames we can see :
 ValueMap& framesDict = dict["frames"].asValueMap();
Once there is no tag with name of "frames", the ASSERT will occured in Value::asValueMap
Unfortunately, if you added a particle in the cocostudio v1.6, then you would got a exported json file
with a particle plist file in it. And, the particle plist file had no tag names "frames".
